xmltoanntree.py¶

This module is to create the raw txt file form the pickle file to an Annotation Tree file.

Note: That the Annotation Tree file is a pickle that works in Poio GUI.

class xmltoanntree.ProcessContent(metafile)[source]¶

Class that handles the XML test_split.

The class uses the ContentHandler from SAX XML.

Methods

get_token_id()[source]¶

Return the id token of each element in the xml file.

get_tokenizer()[source]¶

Return the token of each element in the xml file.

Each token is composed by start and the end of a region.

process()[source]¶

Return the tokens of the regions parsed by the class XmlHandler.

class xmltoanntree.XmlHandler[source]¶

Class that handles the XML test_split.

The class uses the ContentHandler from SAX XML.

Methods

get_token_id()[source]¶

Return the id token of each element in the xml file.

get_tokenizer()[source]¶

Return the token of each element in the xml file.

Each token is composed by start and the end of a region.

startElement(name, attrs)[source]¶

Method from ContentHandler Class.

Need each line of the xml file.

Parameters :

`name` : str

Name of the tag.

attrs : SAX type

Instance of a line of the xml.
class xmltoanntree.XmlToAnnTree[source]¶

Class that handles the split of the xml files in GrAF format to a Annotation Tree.

Methods

graid_hierarchy(filepath)[source]¶

Return the a Annotation Tree file (pickle) with the the GRAID data hierarchy.

Parameters :

filepath : str

File path of the raw file (txt).
morph_hierarchy(filepath)[source]¶

Return the a Annotation Tree file (pickle) with the the MORPHSYN data hierarchy.

Parameters :

filepath : str

File path of the raw file (txt).
word_hierarchy(filepath)[source]¶

Return the a Annotation Tree file (pickle) with the the WORD data hierarchy.

Parameters :

filepath : str

File path of the raw file (txt).
